Articles.Content:
I know this is just Texture Replacer messing with things, but I thought it pretty neat.

Javascript is disabled. View full album
Edited October 24, 2014 by KasperVld
It's like the Hong Kong version of KSC.
KSC post global warming
Ok, Jeb. Taht WAS one booster to many!

Gives me a feeling of the atlantis city in Stargate atlantis.

Like it.
So that's what it might look like on Laythe. Neat.
Looks awsome
Danny did this no mods required with his thing that clawed kerbals.

Oh, hey, Atlantis xD

Yeah, Danny did that in his latest video with the claw-kraken-machine thingy he build.

I don't use texture replacer or any visual enhancement mods and this happens to me quite frequently since .25. Usually when the space center first loads. The water then disappears south to north after a second or two.

I haven't used the claw yet in this version.

I thought it was normal. ( She said it happens to a lotta guys my age... )
Kerbalgate: Atlantis... Now with Shepherd Kerman, Ronan Kerman, and McKay Kerman

So that's what it might look like on Laythe. Neat.

Oh man.. Why has nobody made a mod to let us build a KSC on another planet yet. I know this might be quite the task but.. A man can dream..

And I came here thinking this would be another person confused about the island runway.

I was wrong, carry on.

I do get this bug sometimes, but it appears briefly and then it goes back to normal. I haven't had it stay like that, before, though.

"We build a pump to get laythe's oceans into kerbin! That solves the fact that.. uh.. The oceans are too small? Wait, no, it was giant before. I guess now we're just making it bigger!"

So that's what it would look like on Laythe. Neat.

OH god yes. That would be cool. Not sure if the grass would work in that environment (or if it would be worth spending the resources maintaining it). But yeah, it would be really fun to have that kind of base there.

I would like to build Atalntis from the series someday; might need a better computer though!

and a mod to put a KSC on it...
Ya that's happened to me too. Pretty funny to see tho

Oh man.. Why has nobody made a mod to let us build a KSC on another planet yet. I know this might be quite the task but.. A man can dream..

And then you can do a Jool-5 with a tiny rocket, because there's no interplanetary transfer
Danny got to it first. Mods are pretty cool, but glitches are even more cool.

Oh man.. Why has nobody made a mod to let us build a KSC on another planet yet. I know this might be quite the task but.. A man can dream..

Extraplanetary Launchpads sort of accomplishes this. It allows you to put launchpads and runways on other planets and launch craft that you built in the VAB or SPH from them if you have the right resources to build them.
Yeah, That should be an option
